synopsis.text: The anime, a graduate work from 2012 by Hiroko Satsuma at Tokyo University of the Arts, presents a captivating nighttime adventure. A mysterious sand man appears in a child's bedroom, beckoning a beloved, dusty stuffed animal to join him on a journey over the hill. Unwilling to let go of his cherished toy, the child bravely follows them into the unknown darkness of the night, determined to reclaim his precious companion. This enchanting tale invites viewers to embark on a heartwarming quest filled with wonder and courage.
